attributes.action: STOP FOREIGN AID AND PAY OFF OUR COUNTRYS DEBTS
attributes.additional_details: Stop all forein aid and pay off Great Britain's debts before giving money away. The tax payers are suffering with the cost of rising inflation and job cuts due to poor administration by pen pushers in Whitehall signing away millions of pounds to under developed countrys whose governments are milking the donated money and buying arms etc.
